summary:
Hi! I'm Matt Chappell, a multi-passionate Solutions Architect and full-stack designer. With expertise spanning across multiple technologies and frameworks, I aim to create automation solutions seamlessly but also enhances user experience.

Throughout my career, I've worked in diverse environments, constantly evolving and adapting to the latest tech trends. My experiences range from developing intricate backend systems to crafting intuitive frontend interfaces. I believe in continuous learning and strive to merge innovation with best practices.
